title: Its like players don't like getting one shot.
body:
What do players complain about. Duskblade, out of stealth twitch, static shiv with iedge hit, zoe q, veigar ulti. Old nid Q. 

Riot- "Hmmm, we better buff damage." "Lower CD's, and no mana costs would be fun too"

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=GigglesO,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EaJg02oE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-02-20T04:56:55.452+0000)
>
> Gotta remember to press Q.

WHAT IS Q???

It's almost like players don't want to deviate from one "meta" build and build to accommodate the team they are fighting against, and they complain the system  is broken when they don't build right.


No offense..... there are only 2 champs which imo outperform the right builds:

{{champion:84}} and {{champion:35}} 

Akali does so much damage that building tanky vs her really only means the difference between her killing you in 1 shot or in 2 chains. And she has 3.

Shaco atm can 2 shot any mage who has 280 Armor, simply by having {{item:3147}} and {{item:3031}}  in his build without even having a {{item:3036}} . 

Twitch: build armor, back out of his attack range before he 5 stacks so that when he E's you don't take the huge hit.
Zoe: BUILD MAG RESIST (any at all severely nerfs her kit, and dodge her E. Her Q alone won't kill you)
Veigar: Banshee's Veil, Mercurial Treads/don't walk into the wall = gg Veigar. Only gets big if you let him.
Nidalee: Nidalee Q is still strong. In fact, the ONLY nerf it has had that has been sustained was on its max damage (among about 9 BUFFS) getting reduced from 450 to 390. The Min damage reduction was reversed and the AP scaling was reverted. Its projectile width was increased, mana cost reduced. Don't know where you get that it's weak.

Learn to build vs a team.

"my no defense build, squishy champion is getting one shot! if only i had one defensive item then i wouldn't be getting one shot by stuff but i need muh damages!"

-typical player that doesn't like being one shot
